config.matchQuery: PREFIX tgn: PREFIX gvp: PREFIX skos: PREFIX luc: PREFIX xl: PREFIX foaf: PREFIX wgs84: SELECT ?queryId ?entity ?label ?score ?description (CONCAT('') AS ?_map) (CONCAT('[o]') AS ?url) { { # QUERY ?entity skos:inScheme tgn: . BIND(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(,"([\\+\\-\\&\\|\\!\\(\\)\\{\\}\\[\\]\\/\\^\\\"\\~\\*\\?\\:\\\\])","\\\\$1"),"^ +| +$", ""),", *"," "),"\\. ","* ") AS ?escapedQuery) ?entity luc:term ?escapedQuery . ?entity gvp:prefLabelGVP [xl:literalForm ?pname]. FILTER (?pname=) ?entity gvp:placeTypePreferred/gvp:prefLabelGVP [xl:literalForm ?description ]. OPTIONAL { ?entity gvp:parentStringAbbrev ?pp1 } BIND(CONCAT(?pname, COALESCE(CONCAT(", ",?pp1),"")) AS ?label) ?entity gvp:displayOrder ?do . BIND(1.0-(1.0-(1.0/COALESCE(?do,1.0))) AS ?score) ?entity foaf:focus/wgs84:lat ?lat . ?entity foaf:focus/wgs84:long ?long . BIND( AS ?queryId) } # /QUERY } ORDER BY DESC(?score)
